page.title: 10Council housing in Paisley..
page.content: In Paisley there is a council { {waiting list}of 20,000. However,there is no new council building because of {financial limits.}Some{sheltered} housing has been built and there has been renovation of old houses. The most desired council housing in our area is in{George St.}It takes 20 years to get a transfer. The least sought after area is{Ferguslie Park.} This is a poor area and there is much vandalism.Some houses have had to be{ {demolished.}To help tenants an {area {office}has been built in Ferguslie. Few tenants in our area have{bought {their own council houses.}Prefered houses for this are semi-detached or "cottage"type.There are few of these in our area. Problems occur with some houses. Dampness caused by{condensation}is perhaps the worst.
